name: ADDR_HX
description: This table extracts each patient's historical addresses.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_CITY
columns.description: This item stores the city from a patient's historical address.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the state from a patient's historical address.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_ZIP
columns.description: This item stores the postal code from a patient's historical address.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the county from a patient's historical address.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the country from a patient's historical address.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the house number from a patient's historical address.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the district from a patient's historical address.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_CONTACT
columns.description: This item stores the name of the contact person associated with a patient's historical address.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_PURPOSE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the purpose of a patient's historical address.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_START_DT
columns.description: This item stores the date on which a patient's historical address became effective.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_END_DT
columns.description: This item stores the date on which a patient's historical address is no longer effective.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_PDS_IDNT
columns.description: This item stores the unique identifier assigned to a patient's historical address by the Personal Demographics Service.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the address type of a patient's historical address.
